cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.5)

project(libdeqp)

# Check if the major CMakeLists.txt file has correctly set
# the ANDROID_ROOT directory.
if (IS_DIRECTORY ${ANDROID_ROOT})
    message(STATUS "${PROJECT_NAME}, has been set android root")
else ()
    if (IS_DIRECTORY ${BUILD_NATIVE_ROOT})
        message(WARNING "${PROJECT_NAME}, set ANDROID_ROOT via BUILD_NATIVE_ROOT=${BUILD_NATIVE_ROOT}")
        set(ANDROID_ROOT ${BUILD_NATIVE_ROOT})
        set(OUT_INTERMEDIATES_ROOT ${ANDROID_ROOT}/out/soong/.intermediates)
    else ()
        message(FATAL_ERROR "${PROJECT_NAME}, ANDROID_ROOT was NULL")
    endif ()
endif ()

#################### libdeqp ####################

        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/internal/ditAstcTests.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/internal/ditBuildInfoTests.cpp

        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/internal/ditFrameworkTests.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/internal/ditImageCompareTests.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/internal/ditImageIOTests.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/internal/ditSRGB8ConversionTest.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/internal/ditSeedBuilderTests.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/internal/ditTestCase.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/internal/ditTestLogTests.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/internal/ditTestPackage.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/internal/ditTestPackageEntry.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/internal/ditTextureFormatTests.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/internal/ditVulkanTests.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/pch.cpp
)
set(SOURCE_FILES "")
foreach (file ${FILES})
    if (EXISTS ${file})
        list(APPEND SOURCE_FILES ${file})
    endif ()
endforeach ()

if (NOT SOURCE_FILES)
    message(WARNING "${PROJECT_NAME}, source files not exist")
else ()
    add_library(libdeqp SHARED ${SOURCE_FILES})

    target_include_directories(libdeqp
            PUBLIC
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/execserver
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/executor
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/framework/vulkan
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/framework/vulkan/generated/vulkan
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/modules/vulkan
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/modules/vulkan/amber
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/modules/vulkan/api
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/modules/vulkan/binding_model
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/modules/vulkan/clipping
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/modules/vulkan/compute
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/modules/vulkan/conditional_rendering
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/modules/vulkan/descriptor_indexing
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/modules/vulkan/device_group
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/modules/vulkan/draw
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/modules/vulkan/dynamic_state

            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/modules/vulkan/fragment_shader_interlock

            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/modules/vulkan/fragment_shading_rate
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/modules/vulkan/geometry
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/modules/vulkan/image
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/external/vulkancts/modules/vulkan/imageless_framebuffer

            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/framework/xexml
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules

            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/gles2
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/gles2/accuracy

            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/gles31/functional
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/gles31/stress
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/glshared
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp/modules/internal
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp-deps/SPIRV-Headers/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp-deps/glslang
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp-deps/glslang/glslang
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp-deps/glslang/OGLCompilersDLL
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp-deps/glslang/glslang/OSDependent
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp-deps/glslang/glslang/MachineIndependent
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp-deps/glslang/glslang/HLSL
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp-deps/glslang/glslang/GenericCodeGen
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp-deps/glslang/SPIRV
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp-deps/SPIRV-Tools/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp-deps/amber/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/deqp-deps/amber
    )

    # Add c/c++ flags
    target_compile_options(libdeqp PRIVATE
            -DAMBER_ENABLE_VK_DEBUGGING=0
            -Wall
            -Werror
            -Wno-unused-private-field
    )

    target_link_libraries(libdeqp
            deqp_amber
            deqp_glslang_GenericCodeGen
            deqp_glslang_MachineIndependent
            deqp_glslang_OGLCompiler
            deqp_glslang_OSDependent
            deqp_glslang_SPIRV
            deqp_glslang_SPVRemapper
            deqp_glslang_glslang
            deqp_spirv-tools
            jni_headers
            libEGL
            libGLESv2
            libandroid
            libc
            libc++_static
            libc++demangle
            libclang_rt.builtins
            libdl
            liblog
            libm
            libpng_ndk
            libz
    )
endif ()
#################### libdeqp ####################
